'''Dragon of the City of Flowing Ash''' is a quest-exclusive enemy encountered in the {{Quest|Vaulting the Wall of Morning Mist}}.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|pyro_res = 70%

|hp_ratio     = 12
|hp_type      = 2
|atk_ratio    = 8
|atk_type     = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Void Ward
|desc_1      = The dragon possesses a [[Void Ward]] which grants it immunity to DMG until destroyed. The void barrier has a durability of '''1000'''. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack, or '''40''' per second while in contact with the player's Ring of Light.

|name_2      = Wing Swipe
|desc_2      = Attacks with one of its wings, dealing '''40% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.

|name_3      = Sweep
|desc_3      = Sweeps the ground around itself with one wing, then drills forward at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.

|name_4      = Fireballs
|desc_4      = Fires up to 4 fireballs in succession at the player, each dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.

|name_5      = Flamebreath
|desc_5      = Shoots fire from its mouth and sweeps across an area in front of it, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} on hit.

|name_6      = Charged Shockwave
|desc_6      = Absorbs power from 3 Secret Source Scraps around the arena. The player may collect a Secret Source Scrap to prevent it from being absorbed. When charging completes, raises then slams both of its wings, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} around itself. For each Secret Source Scrap successfully absorbed, recovers '''150''' Void Ward durability and causes an additional explosion at the scrap's original location, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.
}}
